Text.Text: Today's modern tourist wants nothing more than to bring back a high-quality, hand-made souvenir from his extraordinary trip to the Old World for his loved ones at home. Both modern and traditional materials can be combined into a variety of attractive souvenirs.
Supplies your Tourists with souvenirs to buff Hotels and Tourist Moorings in the vicinity.
Overview of the Souvenir Shops used to supply your Tourists with souvenirs beside the sales in Hotels.

The modern tourist is attracted by the offer of discounted souvenirs. In order to bring enough visual material for those who stayed at home, he demands a large variety of products at a reasonable price. Modern and cheap materials, combined with the advancement of the assembly line, can be combined into a variety of suitable products.
